评论概述: Great watch at a great price
评论详情: I am blown away at how nice this watch is for the price that I paid.  It could easily pass for a $300 -$500 watch, and it cost less that $40.  Incredible.  I love the caliper type watch hands; I love how they point, with precision, to exactly what time it is.  I don't like fat or thick watch hands, they don't convey precision the way thin watch hands with chiseled points do.  This is truly a very expensive looking watch for a great price, and yes, it keeps very accurate time.  I definitely got my money's worth.
